summary: This document is a correspondence from Ghislaine Maxwell to Scott Stackman and Lyle Casriel at UBS Private Wealth Management, authorizing the transfer of funds from her account to Angara Trust. It details multiple transfers, including a specific amount of $14,200.

persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is the sender of the correspondence, authorizing the transfer of funds from her account to Angara Trust.

persons.name: Lyle Casriel
persons.context: Lyle Casriel is another recipient of the correspondence regarding the fund transfers.
